item.title: Ecto up and running
item.description: So you just started working with phoenix and you need to learn to use the sql layer. Ecto is an immensly powerful library for working with sql. Unlike other ORMs you may have used, Ecto embraces what makes sql great and manages to add to that rather trying to make it something else entirely. With that in mind, the purpose of this guide is to get you up to speed with doing basic operations in ecto.
